root: ^... drug use in Barangay Pamilay Eskinita has increased in the past three weeks.
^The police and PDEA are still looking for the person(s) responsible for selling illegal drugs.
^The Department of Health advises everyone to not use drugs. Drug use has been found to reduce the health and wellbeing of drug users, and can potentially lead to death.
^If you see suspicious activity, please report them to the police or PDEA as soon as possible.
